lead_paragraph: To the Editor: While Abigail Trillin (Op-Ed, May 20) is correct to say that the debate about bilingual education is political, she unwittingly demonstrates why it is so controversial.
abstract: William C Brown letter says California's abolition of bilingual education is quite rightly a political decision, and shows that public is unconvinced by 'experts' (S)

headline.main: Data Are In: Bilingual Classes Fail
